name: Krag's Creations
description:
You awaken in a very dark and eerie "dungeon". A man watches over you as you complete these puzzles, the estranged DR. KRAG. Become the doctor's lab rat, as you move from contraption to contraption, each step ever so closer to your escape. Will you find your way out? Or will you run out of time and have one of Krag's menacing creations crush you to pieces?

Controls:

  • WASD to move. 
  • Left Shift to run
  • Left Control to crouch
  • E to interact
  • Left click to hold/drop items
  • Right click to throw items
  • ESC for settings/quitting
